meanings.definition: A type of sedimentary rock formed from compacted mud.
meanings.sent1: The geologist studied the mudstones to learn about ancient environments.
meanings.sent2: The road was built using mudstones as a sturdy base.
meanings.sent3: The mudstones in the garden made the gnome statues look like they were sinking.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as solid as the mudstones beneath her feet.
meanings.sent5: The mudstones held the secrets of centuries in their layers.

meanings.definition: Rocks composed mainly of clay-sized particles.
meanings.sent1: The artist used mudstones to create a unique sculpture.
meanings.sent2: The hiker marveled at the beauty of the mudstones along the trail.
meanings.sent3: The mudstones in the riverbed played hide and seek with the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline stood tall against the backdrop of the mudstones.
meanings.sent5: The mudstones whispered stories of the earth's past to those who listened.
